name: CROSSROADS STRATEGIES, LLC ON BEHALF OF TC SERVICES, INC.
description: Educating in support of the Independent Contractor (IC) model in trucking.
sampleDescriptions: Educating on the importance of the independent contractor model in trucking, so critical to our Nation's supply chain and economic competitiveness in the global marketplace.
Educating on the importance of the independent contractor model in trucking, so critical to our Nation's supply chain and economic competitiveness in the global marketplace.

Educating and informing policy-makers about the importance of supporting and preserving the well-founded independent contractor model in trucking, as a critical component of our Nation's supply-chain;
